title: Gang Yin | Northwestern Health Sciences University
description: Gang Yin is a clinician at the NWHSU Sweere Clinic. Gang is a listener and supporter in patients' journey of healing.
cleaned_text: Gang Yin, L.Ac.(NCCAOM)®, M.S.O.M Professional interests: - Insomnia, anxiety, depression, ADHD, - Hypothyroidism, rheumatoid arthritis - Cancer recovery after operation - Post COVID-19 Syndrome ( fatigue, brain frog), etc. Practice philosophy: I am the listener and supporter in patients' journey of healing, I practice from my heart. What patients say about me: He is knowledgeable, thoughtful, I trust him. On a personal note: I like cooking, enjoying delicious food with family and friends. I also enjoy reading, watching movies and playing the Hulusi (a Traditional Chinese instrument). Education - Master of Science in Oriental Medicine, American Academy of Acupuncture and Oriental Medicine, USA - Bachelor of Chinese Medicine, Nanjing University of Chinese Medicine, China
